Name: Fantasy Battles
About the game: Fantasy Battles is a strategy game in which you simulate epic battles against the undead. At the beginning of each level, you can spawn units on your side of the battlefield. Each unit has specific strengths and weaknesses. Use strategic formations to achieve victory. Features: 36 levels simulating battles of Humans vs Undead 12 unit types 3 environments cartoon graphics
